评论概述: The open back detail adds a trendy and feminine touch to these tops
评论详情: As a fitness enthusiast who values both style and functionality in my workout wardrobe, I recently tried out the Women's Open Back Workout Tops Cropped Loose Fit Ribbed Yoga Tank Tops, and I have to say, they have quickly become my new favorite go-to tops for working out.  Let's start with the design. The open back detail adds a trendy and feminine touch to these tops, elevating them from basic workout wear to stylish activewear essentials. The cropped length is flattering and on-trend, offering just the right amount of coverage while still allowing for freedom of movement during my workouts. Whether I'm hitting the gym, attending a yoga class, or going for a run outdoors, these tank tops make me feel confident and stylish every step of the way.  Now, let's talk about comfort. The ribbed fabric is soft, stretchy, and breathable, providing a comfortable and supportive fit that moves with my body during even the most intense workouts. The loose fit allows for ample airflow, keeping me cool and comfortable from warm-up to cool-down. The open back design not only adds a stylish flair but also enhances ventilation, preventing overheating and ensuring that I stay comfortable and dry throughout my workout.  In terms of performance, these tank tops exceed expectations. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps sweat at bay, helping me stay dry and focused during even the toughest workouts. The cropped length is not only flattering but also practical, allowing for easy layering over sports bras or high-waisted leggings for added coverage and support.  Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Women's Open Back Workout Tops Cropped Loose Fit Ribbed Yoga Tank Tops. They offer the perfect combination of style, comfort, and performance for all my workout needs. Whether you're hitting the gym, practicing yoga, or simply running errands, these tank tops are sure to become a staple in your activewear rotation. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!
Did not realize that the matieral was ribbed (not my favorite) but the sizing is true to form and the cut is very cute.

Super sexy. They are very comfortable, I love them for the gym. They’re just absolutely the best workout shirts I’ve ever had. They were a little tricky for me to figure out how to put them on. Lol but once you get the hang of it, it’s easy. I’ve ended up buying numerous colors. The first one I got was the black one, and they are all true to size
The colour is not as flattering but it’s comfortable and the back is cute!
Washed well, doesn’t shrink or stretch out. Loose fit, good for Pilates

Love this top. I always get compliments at the gym when I wear it. The fit is good, and the quality is great.

评论概述: Love these! Can be fussy to put on correctly.
评论详情: Absolutely love this top - once I get it on. Can be weird to finagle into as the material flops easily while pulling on. But these are perfect for intense cardio like spinning. Nice and airy.

There is a little more fabric in the back than showed in the picture, but it is pretty close. Also the fabric has a slight ribbing to it, so it is not a flat cotton, it doesn't bother me, but just a small note. It seems a little thin on the fabric but not horrible, but I think just a little care when washing, as usually those thin fabrics break down over time a little quicker.

It's soft, the sizes run a little small. I over estimated how comfortable I would be wearing this shirt the open back part is no joke, and I will probably donate it to a local thrift shop for someone else to fall in love with it.
The fabric is thin but works great as a workout cover-up. True to size. Took me a minute to figure out how to put it on but I like it

Looks great.  It's barely a shirt, which is exactly what I wanted!  I sweat a TON at the gym and hate to feel wet fabric laying on me.  This exposes so much skin but still lets me feel covered.  I love it.
Good top to wear when working out. Only note ill make is if you are bending down a lot this may not be good - it slides off your shoulders since it is so open
Comfy x3!
It's lightweight and perfect for leg day. I always get complimented.
Got this because it'll show off my back tattoo. Definitely requires a bra, though, as otherwise I'd have a lot of sideboob. Take that as you will, but that's what strapless bras are for!
I love a good open backed shirt. This is cute, lightweight and flattering. It’s been a great addition to my normal rotation.
Wear these a loooot. They’re thin but that’s actually part of what I like. Super easy to throw on over a sports bra. Soft material. Held up through a wash and air dry.

I think I’ve bought one of almost all workout tips on Amazon and while some have been really cute they just never flatter my body.. problem is I have a really short torso. So most crops have this awkward length under the boob but not quite long enough and it’s always just all wrong of a fit. But I love open side/back shirts. When I saw these I had very little hope but it looked so cute. Bought black and dark green. Wore them both and oh my gosh… literally perfect! Short but comes to the top of my leggings, the sides are open but I don’t have to wear a sports bra, just a sticky bra and it doesn’t flash side boob! The cross back is so adorable, it flows and moves but never reveals the ladies if you know what I mean! I felt SO good wearing this today! Getting a few more colors now!

I have 2 of these now and plan on adding more! Very comfortable and cute for gym and doesn’t restrict movement.  I even like the ribs!  When running the front does swing a little which I’m not a fan of but I just tuck in for those 20 min 🤪

It looks nicer in the pictures. I got one in light blue and it fit a little looser for me, I am normally size xs but S often fits well in items where it is the smallest. Plus light blue arrived with a some lighter stains or discoloration:(

评论概述: Keeping it comfortable but still let's you feel sexy

Cute little staple to add to your workout clothes. Fabric is soft.
These have become my go to summer tops. Good for casual wear and workouts. Cool in these hot days! Great quality and fit, true to size

The shirt itself is really cute and made well and the color is accurate to the picture. But I hate the material. It’s cheap and wrinkles sooo easily. I got the wrinkles out, hung it up and wore it later and within 20 minutes it was just as wrinkly as the pic. Will not be buying any more.

Love this workout top, it is very lightweight and the back gives some coverage but will also allow your sports bras with interesting back detail to be seen. I bought a small and have 34DD bust (5'4" - 118lbs).
Material and fit makes it cozy and comfortable. Swing back open makes it extra special. Not too short.  Love this top.

评论详情: I love it

I love this top! It highlights all of your hard work from the back. I had so many compliments about this top. My only complaint, is that it loses it shape. Still cute and worth the money just would give it 5 stars if it held its shape.

I have like 6 of these! Now, I do wear them in the gym or out and about. I do not wear them if I know I am doing a ton of bending in my workout due to the way it opens. It doesn't over expose, it's just distracting to have it flop around too much. I do CrossFit style workouts and love these. The price is good and there are lots of cute colors to choose from. I am 5'2 and about 130-135#. I bought size small for all 6 colors. Fit's perfectly. In fact, I'm wearing a white one right now. :)

Context: I've been lifting for years. I've got a big chest, back, and shoulders from lifting weights. I'm 5'9.5'' and 188 lbs of muscle.  I love this top. Holy cow. I have such a hard time finding cute tops that flatter me and also allow me to actually work out at the gym. The open back of this top means a space heater like me gets a chance to stay cool during my workout. It also stays in place due to the strap on the back of your neck. Have I mentioned how flattering it is yet? And how soft and flowy the material is? I'm a huge fan, I've already ordered more in different colors. I will say, the light gray top was a different fabric texture than the dark green and dark gray versions, but I still like it.
This is such a perfect cute cropped workout shirt! I absolutely love the fit, its incredibly flattering!
Very flattering and light weight

I love this tank, and I have it in 3 colors. I enjoy it for both exercise and looking cute going out. For running, I like that it covers my chest from just below my neck, so I can protect my boobs from sun exposure. It’s also not tight fitting so it’s very breathable. It’s mostly open in the back which I feel properly offsets the coverage in the front, so I don’t get too hot. Plus I really like it going out in jeans.
I adore this top!! Put a cute bra type under the shirt and you got it.  I love it. Plan to order different colors

This was given as a gift to a 17-year-old. She wears it under a shirt or jacket and it suits her nicely. The fit was just right, I ordered a small and she usually wears a small in shirts. The back drapes nicely and allows for decent coverage. I did try it on and I usually wear a medium, it was a little ‘sexier’ fit with some side boob, but not extreme. I think this would work well as a workout top, but only if it were layered to avoid exposure during yoga poses.

I’m an older woman, but this shirt is so awesome looking on me. I love working out in this. I just put a cute, strappy sports bra on underneath, and it looks top notch. OMG!! This is super cute.  Hardly ever wear a bra so it was just what I have been looking for. ❤️❤️
